game.name: One More Delve
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, VR Only, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: One More Delve is a physics based dungeon crawler hack and slash adventure. Fight, loot, and explore alone or in up to 3 player co-op as you delve in the dungeons and wield a diverse arsenal of one-handed and two-handed melee weapons, bows, shields, and powerful spells.
game.shortDescriptionEn: One More Delve is a physics based dungeon crawler hack and slash adventure. Fight, loot, and explore alone or in up to 3 player co-op as you delve in the dungeons and wield a diverse arsenal of one-handed and two-handed melee weapons, bows, shields, and powerful spells.
